Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan is set to face Afghanistan in a Super 4 clash at Asia Cup 2022 tomorrow, September 7 (Wednesday).
Pakistan won against India by five wickets in their previous match.
Afghanistan lost to Sri Lanka in their first match of the Super 4 stage.
A victory for Pakistan will ensure their berth in the final of the continental tournament.
An Afghanistan victory is crucial as a loss will knock them out of the competition.

Afghanistan will depend on the performances of Rashid Khan and Mujeeb Ur Rahman in the bowling department.
Pakistan will rely on Babar Azam, Shadab Khan, and Mohammad Rizwan (if fit) for their batting and bowling.
